entries.name: Jarboe Street Sidewalk Mini-Garden
entries.description: Resident-created sidewalk mini-garden cluster with grouped container plants and hanging planters along a residential frontage.
entries.visit_notes: Publicly visible from the sidewalk. Keep pathways clear and avoid touching private planters.

verification.evidence: Manual backlog seed with real-world reference photo captured 2026-02-24; house number 301 visible in source image.

photo_reference.location_hint: San Francisco residential sidewalk frontage (house number 301 visible)
photo_reference.caption: Sidewalk mini-garden with potted plants and hanging baskets along a neighborhood street.
